itunes:title: Episode 264 - Losing A Father
title: Episode 264 - Losing A Father
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Our very own Bert Kuntz lost his father last week and was kind enough to sit down and talk about his life.  Losing a parent is extremely difficult and it's something a lot our listeners write in about and we wanted to let you know you're not alone.
itunes:summary:
Our very own Bert Kuntz lost his father last week and was kind enough to sit down and talk about his life.  Losing a parent is extremely difficult and it's something a lot our listeners write in about and we wanted to let you know you're not alone.

content:encoded:
Our very own Bert Kuntz lost his father last week and was kind enough to sit down and talk about his life.  Losing a parent is extremely difficult and it's something a lot our listeners write in about and we wanted to let you know you're not alone.
